tools.name: string_search_proteins
tools.description: Fuzzy search for proteins in STRING by name. Returns ranked candidates with STRING identifiers.

tools.name: string_get_interactions
tools.description: Get protein-protein interactions for a STRING CURIE (e.g., STRING:9606.ENSP00000269305).

tools.name: string_get_network_image_url
tools.description: Get a network visualization image URL for a set of STRING proteins.
